definition: so many that the bamboo slats have been exhausted/innumerable crimes (idiom)/see also 罄筆難書|罄笔难书[qing4 bi3 nan2 shu1]
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: The charge-sheet against the pint-sized piece of plastic is long.
sentences.chinese: 這個塑料小人的罪行真是罄竹難書。

sentences.english: Violent crime and corruption are also off the charts.
sentences.chinese: 而暴力犯罪及腐敗行爲更是罄竹難書。

sentences.english: The scoundrel's crimes were too numerous to record.
sentences.chinese: 這個歹徒罪行累累，罄竹難書。
